wikipedia_page.main: Edward John "Teddy" Beckett, 5th Baron Grimthorpe and 9th Baronet of Leeds (born 20 November 1954), is a British peer. He was racing manager to the late Prince Khalid Abdullah who died in January 2021.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

*Edward Beckett, 5th Baron Grimthorpe (1954–), racing manager to thoroughbred horse racer Khalid ibn Abdullah
